channel.title: scp on Simple...
channel.description: Recent content in scp on Simple...

item.title: 常用命令
item.author: coffeerene.zhao@gmail.com (Coofee)
item.description: 1. golang跨平台编译 // 如： env GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build *.go 2. ssh ssh -p port username@host 3. scp scp -P port local_file username@host:remote_file scp -P port -r local_dir username@host:remote_dir 4. github pull request # clone git clone https://github.com/coofee/tinker.git # 添加tinker git remote add tinker https://github.com/Tencent/tinker # 从tinker的dev分支创建功能分支 git branch compat-gradle-plugin-3.x-dev tinker/dev git checkout compat-gradle-plugin-3.x-dev # push分支到origin git push -u origin compat-gradle-plugin-3.x-dev # 合并tinker的dev分支代码 git pull tinker dev # 删除远程分支 git push origin --delete compat-gradle-plugin-3.
